TIMELINE.CLICK_TO_SEE_DETAILS: Click on the timeline to see details

STEP_1.TITLE: Day 0
STEP_1.DESCRIPTION: i was born in 1996 in mersin, turkey. i was a very curious child and always wanted to learn new things.

STEP_2.TITLE: First Computer
STEP_2.DESCRIPTION: i started my education in mersin, turkey. i was a very curious child and always wanted to learn new things.

STEP_3.TITLE: Meet with the Internet
STEP_3.DESCRIPTION: i met the internet in 2005. i was amazed by the things i could do with it. i started learning how to use it and meet with linux.

STEP_4.TITLE: Started to Learn Programming
STEP_4.DESCRIPTION: i started coding in 2008. i learned html, css, and javascript. i built my first website and was hooked on coding

STEP_5.TITLE: First website
STEP_5.DESCRIPTION: i built my first website in 2010. it was a simple website for my school project. i was so proud of it.

STEP_6.TITLE: University
STEP_6.DESCRIPTION: i started my university education in 2015. i studied civil engineering. i learned a lot of things about project management and teamwork.

STEP_7.TITLE: changed my career
STEP_7.DESCRIPTION: i decided to change my career in 2023. i wanted to work in tech and build software. i started learning new technologies and building projects.

STEP_8.TITLE: First Job
STEP_8.DESCRIPTION: i got my first job as a full-stack developer in 2024. i worked on a lot of projects and learned a lot of things.

GITHUB.TITLE: a unstoppable developer
GITHUB.DESCRIPTION: After switching to the software industry, I continued to develop without a break.

SERVICES.TITLE: My Services
SERVICES.DESCRIPTION: i offer a wide range of services to help you build your dream project.

MOBILE_APP_DEVELOPMENT.TITLE: Mobile App Development
MOBILE_APP_DEVELOPMENT.DESCRIPTION: I develop mobile applications for both Android and iOS platforms. i use the latest technologies and tools to deliver high-quality applications.

WEB_DEVELOPMENT.TITLE: Web Development
WEB_DEVELOPMENT.DESCRIPTION: I can help you build a website or web app using React, Next.js that looks great on all devices.

BACKEND_DEVELOPMENT.TITLE: Backend Development
BACKEND_DEVELOPMENT.DESCRIPTION: Have a project that requires a backend? I can help you build a scalable and secure backend using Node.js, Express, and Postgresql.

SOMETHING_ELSE.TITLE: Something Else
SOMETHING_ELSE.DESCRIPTION: I  can help you with your custom software development needs. Contact us to discuss your project. like setting up a CI/CD pipeline, writing tests, or deploying your app.

WELCOME.TITLE: Seamless Freelance Experience
WELCOME.DESCRIPTION: Have a project in mind? Let's work together to make it a reality.

PRICING.TITLE: Pricing
PRICING.DESCRIPTION: I keep pricing simple and transparent. No hidden fees. Fair pricing for all types of businesses.

HOURLY_RATE.TITLE: Hourly Rate
HOURLY_RATE.SUBTITLE: I charge $50 per hour for all types of projects.

MONTHLY_RATE.TITLE: Monthly Rate
MONTHLY_RATE.SUBTITLE: I charge $2000 per month for full-time projects.

PRICING.FOOTER: All prices are in USD. I accept payments via PayPal, BTC, and bank transfer.

PLATFORMS.TITLE: Active on different platforms
PLATFORMS.DESCRIPTION: I'm available on the following platforms. You can hire me on any of these platforms.

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: What People Say
TESTIMONIALS.DESCRIPTION: I've worked with some amazing people and companies. Here's what they have to say about me.

CLIENT_1.NAME: Mutlu Kurtbas
CLIENT_1.TITLE: cafe franchise owner
CLIENT_1.REVIEW: He helped to build our order management system, and i was impressed by his ability to communicate complex ideas to non-technical team members.

CLIENT_2.TITLE: Marketing Manager

CLIENT_3.NAME: Natalie Adams
CLIENT_3.TITLE: Warehouse
CLIENT_3.REVIEW: Stock management is a breeze now, and we're able to keep track of our inventory in real time.

CLIENT_4.NAME: Penelope Scott
CLIENT_4.TITLE: IT Manager
CLIENT_4.REVIEW: He helped us build a custom CRM system that has helped us streamline our sales process.
